meanings.sent1: The trappous box was designed to catch mice.
meanings.sent2: The hunter set up a trappous snare to catch rabbits.
meanings.sent3: The trappous net caught the butterfly by surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her trappous plan to surprise her friend worked perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The trappous door closed swiftly, trapping the cat inside.

meanings.sent1: The trappous was hidden in the bushes to catch the fox.
meanings.sent2: The trappous was carefully placed to catch the elusive raccoon.
meanings.sent3: The trappous was so cleverly made that even the wily fox fell for it.
meanings.sent4: The trappous lay in wait, ready to spring its trap on any unsuspecting prey.
meanings.sent5: The trappous was baited with cheese to lure in the curious mouse.

meanings.sent1: He would trappous the area to catch the pesky squirrels.
meanings.sent2: She trappoused the field to catch the rabbits for dinner.
meanings.sent3: They trappous whenever they go camping to catch their own food.
meanings.sent4: The cunning fox trappouses to outsmart its prey.
meanings.sent5: In the game of hide and seek, she always trappouses to catch her friends.
